dataList.appIntro:
Listen Full Quran offline without internet connection
This application is the complete Al-Quran Kareem MP3 Completed Offline. All the Quran recitations on this App are free for download and spilling as mp3s.
Small Apps only 95 MB but Contain complete Quran Surah Mp3. And no need internet connection or wifi to play all surah.
Featured:
- Full Offline Application
- Listen in background
- Read Quran Arab / Latin / Translation
- Quran HD Wallpaper
- This also murrottal Al Quran 30 juz or al quran mp3 reciting
- Touch to play or open next surah / surah list
